revised_title: Gametogenesis and Sex Determination in the Gall-Fly, Neuroterus lenticularis
tldr: The author investigates the gametogenesis and sex determination in the gall-fly, Neuroterus lenticularis, and discovers that the eggs laid by some females undergo maturation and produce males, while others lay unfertilized eggs that develop into females. The study provides insights into the mechanisms of sex determination in insects.
